Player History
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Los Angeles to Philadelphia on 2/8/1986 (Going to PHI: P Carlos Diaz, LF Mike Marshall, 2B Pete Stanicek. Going to LAD: SS Scott Fletcher, P Rocky Childress, P Mike Maddux)...
Injured on 6/15/1986 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 7/5/1986, off Reggie Patterson (CHC)...
